item.title: Hosting simple scripts for cheap on GCP
item.description: On giving an old Macbook Air some rest In the past few weeks I wanted to get a sense of how many remote-friendly jobs are posted on stackoverflow on a given day. To do this, I've written a small Python utility that parses their XML feed and uploads the results on a spreadsheet on Google Drive. So far so good. I initially hosted this script as a crontab job on my old Macbook Air that sits collecting dust on a bookshelf.
